resources.string: Color Blind Helper is a tool that seeks to improve visual conditions for people with color blindness by giving them information such as the name, color composition in RGB or hexadecimal representation from a color in a selected image. \n\nThis application is designed based in the work of French Gauthier Lemoine who used Euclidean metrics, the algorithm kNN (k Nearest Neighbor) and a database of names and values ​​of colors to let you know the name of a given color.
